item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Coinbase, Nike, Amazon & more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades this fashion stock thanks to limited exposure to tariffs
item.description: Ralph Lauren is prepared to weather near-term tariff-related headwinds, Goldman Sachs said.

item.title: Tesla gets a price target cut from RBC as EV competition heats up
item.description: Tesla gains could be limited as competition mounts, according to RBC Capital Markets.

item.title: This crypto stock can rally more than 60% thanks to Trump's support for the industry, Bernstein says
item.description: The firm initiated the cryptocurrency exchange with an outperform rating.
